about_the_game:
The long awaited third Monsters Pack from Tokiwa Graphics is here! Featuring new monsters such as the tricky Mimic or the seductive Saccubus, or the Elemental Monster that could help the Dark Lord in achieving world domination! Add new interesting characters with interesting twists to your story. Now you can create a game with more unique, fun and exciting elements with Classic Monsters Pack No.3!

These monsters are crafted delicately to match to the 4 color-variations of the background graphics. For the sunset background you can use sunset-compatible monsters. Enjoy flawless graphic images in your game by combining with other TOKIWA GRAPHICS background series and other monsters packs!

Features:

* 4 monster battlers: Saccubus, Living Sword, Mimic, Fire Element in 4 color variations; day / sunset / night / rain. Total of 16 side / front-view battler graphics.
* Each character comes with walking sprites in 2 variations (normal and dark shadow). Total of 8 sprites.
* These graphics are for RPG Maker use only!
* Background graphics and Tile graphic shown in the samples below are NOT included in this pack.
